it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network

Class GameRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network.GameRegistry

  • public class GameRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    singleton class which contains all the information about all the games handle by the server. It allows to register games, register players to a specific game, get all the players connected to a specific game, get a Player object from its UUID and so on
    • gameRegistry; HashMap which map each Game with its UUID
    • playerTranslationTable: HashMap which map each Player with its UUID
    • playerConnectionMode: HashMap which map each player with its connection mode
    • instance; the instance of this singleton
    See Also:
    Players, ConnectionType, Game

        public void registerPlayer(Player player,
                           ConnectionType connectionMode)
        register player in the list of connected player, specifing the connection mode the player has used to connect
        Parameters:
        player - player that must be registered
        connectionMode - network mode used by the player to play (socket or RMI)
